text: tae anak( mou ham meat) minban doeng ampi puok del ban rt chenhpi lomnow dthan robsa puokke( daoysaar mean katapvokechch sangkream ryy pel mean chomngureatatbat) daoy puokke mean knea reabpean neak ban phyokhlach pi sechakdeislab te ryy? haey a l laoh ban mean bantoul tow kan puokke tha chaur puok anak slab choh . kraoyomk a l laoh ban thveu aoy puokke rsa laengvinh . pitabrakd nasa a l laoh mean kdei me tda krounea dl mnoussaalok kabonde mnoussa lok pheakochraen mindoeng koun laey
